name: King of Sweets
description:
Once the Kingdom of Sweets flourished, and there were legends about its inhabitants. Because of the salty food lost in recent years, the old king's wrong policies, almost all of the land was ditched. As a new heir, you will have to return the former glory to your kingdom and drive away uninvited guests from the Kingdom of Salt.
Collect resources and tame wild sweets using the multipurpose cannon vacuum cleaner (MPP) to build your farm. Use a unique crafting system to create new types of sweets for battles, farm maintenance and resource gathering. Prepare various syrups and use them as weapons using the MPP.
Invite your friends to defeat especially strong enemies and bosses.
Return your Kingdom to its former glory.

Features:
- construction of the base.
- collection of resources.
- craft.
- command and control of troops.
- resource management.
- cooperative.
- a unique world of sweet and savory foods.
